channel.title: Fan animation--Office Complex
channel.description:
Just a small bug. Towards the end of Office Complex there's an maintenance area with a fan (should be spinning) and blowing wind. You must flip a switch to turn it off so you can continue. The wind blows properly but the fan doesn't spin. I copied the messages/alerts from the console as well.
setpos 883.968750 1519.968750 362.031250;setang 8.014167 -168.391769 0.440166
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=699568925[/url]

item.title: Fan animation--Office Complex
item.dc:creator: txcrix
item.description:
Oh I’m sorry lol here ya go - youtube.com/watch?v=evXHM6mgcAQ

For reference this one includes the fan area at 20:00 (working in this version)

Read full topic

item.title: Fan animation--Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
Awww, DRAT.

You had my hopes up for a FMV set in my favorite Black Mesa level.

Read full topic

item.title: Fan animation--Office Complex
item.dc:creator: txcrix
item.description:
Just a small bug. Towards the end of Office Complex there’s an maintenance area with a fan (should be spinning) and blowing wind. You must flip a switch to turn it off so you can continue. The wind blows properly but the fan doesn’t spin. I copied the messages/alerts from the console as well.
